1489490.name: War Link - 2111 AD
1489490.description:
Welcome to the battlefield of the future! WarLink - VR thrusts you into the heart of futuristic warfare, where you'll experience adrenaline-pumping action and strategic battles like never before.


Battle Royale Mode: Engage in thrilling battles where survival is the only way to victory. Parachute into the battlefield, scavenge for weapons and gear and outlast your opponents in an ever-shrinking play area. With intense firefights and strategic gameplay, every match is a test of skill and endurance.


Battle with Robots Mode: Face off against advanced robotic enemies in a challenging mode that will push your combat skills to the limit. Fight through waves of enemies, each more formidable than the last, using a variety of tactics and weapons to emerge victorious.


Wide Selection of Characters: Choose from a diverse roster of characters, each with their own unique abilities and personalities. Whether you prefer to be a stealthy assassin, a heavy-hitting tank, or a versatile support, there's a character to suit every playstyle.

Plenty of Weapons: Arm yourself with an impressive array of futuristic weapons, from high-powered rifles and explosive launchers to energy weapons and melee weapons. With so many options at your disposal, you can customize your loadout to suit your preferred playstyle and strategy.

Futuristic Backgrounds: Immerse yourself in stunning, futuristic environments that will transport you to a world ravaged by war. From urban cityscapes to desolate wastelands, each environment is beautifully crafted and rich in detail, thanks to HDR support.

Parachute Jumping: Take your battles to new heights with the ability to parachute into the battlefield. Use this strategic advantage to surprise your enemies, access hard-to-reach areas, and plan your approach to each match with precision.

Regular Updates and New Content: With regular updates and new content, WarLink - VR is constantly evolving, offering new challenges and experiences to keep you engaged. From new characters and weapons to fresh game modes and maps, there's always something new to discover.

Are you ready to step into the future of warfare? Join the battle in WarLink - VR and experience the thrill of futuristic combat like never before!

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
